statements: DELETE FROM incident_reports WHERE department = 'HR' AND compliance_level < 3;
DELETE FROM incident_reports WHERE reported_by = 'John Doe' AND compliance_level >= 4;
DELETE FROM IncidentReports WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ComplianceInvestigations WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe' AND investigation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ComplianceInvestigations WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe' AND investigation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ReportComments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM incident_comments WHERE incident_id IN (SELECT incident_id FROM incident_reports WHERE status = 'resolved');
DELETE FROM incident_images WHERE incident_id IN (SELECT incident_id FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01');
